text: tannalil ninnutanneyulla oralkku nam divyasandesam nalkiyat. janannalkkearadbhutamayi teannunnea? janannalkk munnariyipp nalkananit. satyavisvasikalkk tannalute nathankal satyattinarhamaya padaviyuntenna suvartta ariyikkanum. satyanisedhikal parannu: "iyal vyaktamayum oru mayajalakkaran tanne.â€
